TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but I don't understand it so it makes 9+10=21. 

I wish that I didn't have to do my homework. I just got back from the fine arts showcase!

Granted, but you become blind and can only think in 2 dimensions, like Mr. A Square or Yendred.

I wish I could come up with more creative wishes on a whim.

Edited April 7, 2016 by cubinator
Typo

Granted, but they're all corrupted already

I wish that Trump would start losing
Granted. I wish for Trump to stop losing.

Grant revoked, no new wish added. Also, if Trump wins the candidacy, then it's a safe bet Hillary will be the next President.

 

I wish we could FIRE all of CONgress and start over, doing it right this time...

Granted, but now they're all Trump clones

I wish for a smarter dog.

(Not Rick and Morty)

Granted, but the dog becomes too smart and takes over the world. 

I wish for no more political wishes in this thread.

Granted, there are now silly wishes.

I wish I had a chair.

Edited April 12, 2016 by CelticCossack51
Ninja'd

Granted, but it's quite uncomfortable.

I wish I had more friends

 

1 hour ago, cubinator said:

Granted, but the dog becomes too smart and takes over the world.

That WAS a Rick and Morty episode! You had ONE job!

Granted. You now have 800 friends, all of whom are cannibals.

I wish for cheese

Granted. You receive cheese in quantity. In fact, an entire Moon's worth (cue Wallace and Gromit theme)...

I wish for something insubstantial.

Granted, but it's so insubstantial, it becomes antimatter and you're annihilated immediately

I wish I knew why I thought it was a good idea to convert The Raven to binary and put it through a Text-to-Speech translator

Granted, but you lose the ability to recognise politicians.

I wish I could reticulate splines using Visual Basic while tracking an IP adress flying a plane using a pitch system that takes sound from a zetatron with 21 volts put through it.

Granted, but you fail at all of it and crash the plane.

I wish my german dragon teacher would be replaced by a younger and more friendly one.

Edited April 13, 2016 by ZentroCatson

Granted, but he/she's a warthog.

I wish that my next wish won't be horribly corrupted.

It hasn't been corrupted except for the fact it has.

I order a mystery box on April Fools.

Granted, but it says in the fine print, "Property of Pandora".

I wish for a big bomb that won't kill me.

It kills you.

I wish for a malevolent AI.

Granted, but it is only malevolent while playing Connect 4. Any other time it is quite amiable.

I wish for 2016-05-09 to be a day off.

Granted. The entire day is removed from the calendar.

I wish my favorite math teacher wasn't retiring.

Granted. They grow bitter, being forced to work well past their retirement age. Eventually, they start teaching their students misinformation, leading to a mathematically illiterate public. There is a shortage of engineers and scientists as few know proper math, and the world crumbles into ignorant, anarchy driven pockets. Infrastructure fails as the world is unable to muster the knowledge to fix it.

I wish I wasn't so pessimistic.

Granted, but you become too optimistic.

I wish vshare was illegal, it is bad.

Everything but vshare is illegal.

I wish there was a stock Delta-V indicator

Granted, but it ignores decouplers and assumes an Isp of 1337s.

I wish for non-memoryleak-inducing groundscatter.

Granted, instead it causes your PC to overheat and start burning.

 

I wish I didn't live in a place with so much light pollution.
